Name: Very Rusty Daiquiri
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Honey and spice notes from honeyed herbal liqueur add interest to this Aged Daiquiri .
History: Created in December 2010 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Very Rusty Daiquiri contains 191 calories
